data.name: Template
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="direct:{{source}}"/>
    {{applyUnmarshal input_format input_format_options}}
    <setBody>
        {{#if (eq output_format "json")}}
        <simple trim="false">
<![CDATA[{{safe code_json}}]]>
        </simple>
        {{/if}}
        {{#if (eq output_format "xml")}}
        <simple trim="false">
<![CDATA[{{safe code_xml}}]]>
        </simple>
        {{/if}}
        {{#if (eq output_format "hl7")}}
        <simple trim="false">
<![CDATA[{{safe code_hl7}}]]>
        </simple>
        {{/if}}
        {{#if (eq output_format "csv")}}
        <simple trim="false">
<![CDATA[{{safe code_csv}}]]>
        </simple>
        {{/if}}
        {{#if (eq output_format "raw")}}
        <simple trim="false">
<![CDATA[{{safe code_raw}}]]>
        </simple>
        {{/if}}
    </setBody>
    {{applyUnmarshal output_format output_format_options}}
    {{applyMarshal output_format output_format_options}}
    <multicast>
        {{#each target}}
        <to uri="direct:{{this}}"/>
        {{/each}}
    </multicast>
</route>
data.json_ui_schema:
{
    "code_json": {
        "condition": "output_format=json",
        "ui:columnSize": "12",
        "ui:widget": "AceEditorWidget",
        "ui:mode": "json",
        "ui:beautify": true,
        "ui:height": 400
    },
    "code_xml": {
        "condition": "output_format=xml",
        "ui:columnSize": "12",
        "ui:widget": "AceEditorWidget",
        "ui:mode": "xml",
        "ui:disableValidation": true,
        "ui:beautify": false,
        "ui:height": 400
    },
    "code_hl7": {
        "condition": "output_format=hl7",
        "ui:columnSize": "12",
        "ui:widget": "AceEditorWidget",
        "ui:mode": "text",
        "ui:disableValidation": true,
        "ui:beautify": false,
        "ui:height": 400
    },
    "code_csv": {
        "condition": "output_format=csv",
        "ui:columnSize": "12",
        "ui:widget": "AceEditorWidget",
        "ui:mode": "text",
        "ui:disableValidation": true,
        "ui:beautify": false,
        "ui:height": 400
    },
    "code_raw": {
        "condition": "output_format=raw",
        "ui:columnSize": "12",
        "ui:widget": "AceEditorWidget",
        "ui:mode": "text",
        "ui:disableValidation": true,
        "ui:beautify": false,
        "ui:height": 400
    }
}
